xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: dba:log-delete
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: function dba:log-delete ( $names as xs:string* ) as element(rest:response) { try { $names ! admin:delete-logs(.), web:redirect($dba:CAT, map { 'info': util:info($names, 'log', 'deleted') }) } catch * { web:redirect($dba:CAT, map { 'error': $err:description }) } }
